entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label crashes on Windows due to infinite loop #28171
  • SIGSEGV on Android 5.1.1 #28170
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loading Indicator Stuck with CollectionView #28169
  • why it run well in debug mode, but not in release mode #28168
  • [Windows] MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync keeps handle to file after capturing video #28167
  • MAUI build fails with XARLP7024: System.IO.IOException: The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect #28166
  • FlexLayout misbehaves when Label content has long .Text #28165
  • RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing on iOS and Android #28163
  • [CollectionView]Crash occurs when switching CollectionView.IsVisible right after setting ItemsSource #28162
  • All sub-titles on the Table View Demo App page are inconsistent on iOS, Android, and Windows platforms #28158
    Backlog
  • The slider in the "Right to left TableView" page is abnormal in Android and iOS #28156
    Backlog
  • "Vibrate" Label in "Right to left TableView" on iOS platform is displayed from left to right #28155
  • All first-level headings in the Table View Demo App page are centered on the iOS platform. #28154
    Backlog
  • The border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows only #28153

Closed

  • Can't build Maccatalyst, getting error about merging CSS files? #21618
  • WinUI-Libraries are not compiled or found for packaging when publishing for Windows #28109
  • Label with Center or End horizontal alignment, and InputTransparency="true", sizes strangely #15633

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] add AOT profile for `dotnet new maui -sc` #28172
    platform/android 🤖, delighter, t/perf
  • [iOS & Android] Fix: RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing. #28164
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix RightToLeft is not working for Shell #28161
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160
    area-blazor, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fixed flickering when navigating using GoToAsync #28159
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Label LinebreakMode (TailTruncation) for FormattedText does't work in CollectionView after scroll - fix #28151
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-label, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [ci] Publish VS workload zips #28145
  • [Testing] Enabling UITest Stepper actions for Maccatalyst #28055
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] [Shell] Ensure `AnimationFinished` is called when app backgrounds mid-animation #27534
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2792.45` to `1.0.2903.40` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Add test run message to device tests logs #27993
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView2 Items display issue when Header/Footer is resized on iOS #27076
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Bindings SG] Filter out false positive Binding.Create matches #28138
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: TapGestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion, partner/syncfusion/review
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Trimming][PoC] Make it possible to trim controls and handlers #28115
    t/app-size
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - fix #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #28132
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 4 #28105

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 4 #28137
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fixed SearchBar Dimension Handling to Respect WidthRequest and HeightRequest Values #27449
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
